# calendar

**Instance Property**

The calendar used to interpret the date components.

## Declaration

```swift
var calendar: Calendar? { get set }
```

## Discussion

See [https://developer.apple.com/library/archive/documentation/Cocoa/Conceptual/DatesAndTimes/Articles/dtCalendars.html#//apple_ref/doc/uid/TP40003470] in [https://developer.apple.com/library/archive/documentation/Cocoa/Conceptual/DatesAndTimes/DatesAndTimes.html#//apple_ref/doc/uid/10000039i].

## Setting a Calendar and Time Zone

- **timeZone**: The time zone used to interpret the date components.
